concept.title: 5119.815 Release and notification requirements for non-8(a) procurement.

conbody.p: (a) Where a procurement is awarded as an 8(a) contract, its follow-on or renewable acquisition shall remain in the 8(a) program unless–
(1) SBA agrees to release it, in accordance with 13 CFR § 124.504(d), FAR 19.815, and the DoD and SBA Partnership Agreement.
(2) Follow-on or renewable acquisitions can transition from a stand-alone 8(a) acquisition to There is a mandatory source in accordance with FAR 19.815.
